statements: SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE hotel_id = 1;
SELECT room_number, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT energy_usage, hotel_id FROM energy_consumption WHERE room_number = 101;
SELECT hotel_id, SUM(energy_usage) AS total_energy_usage FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY hotel_id;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY date DESC, room_number ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE energy_usage > 100 ORDER BY date DESC, energy_usage ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT hotel_id, room_number, SUM(energy_usage) AS total_energy_usage FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY hotel_id, room_number HAVING total_energy_usage > 500 ORDER BY total_energy_usage DESC;
SELECT hotel_id, AVG(energy_usage) AS avg_energy_usage FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY hotel_id HAVING avg_energy_usage < 50 ORDER BY avg_energy_usage ASC;
SELECT hotel_id, room_number, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY hotel_id ASC, room_number DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT hotel_id, COUNT(room_number) AS total_rooms FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY hotel_id HAVING total_rooms > 50 ORDER BY total_rooms DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM hotel;
SELECT hotel_name, location FROM hotel WHERE total_rooms > 50;
SELECT hotel_name, total_floors FROM hotel WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE electricity_consumed > 1000;
SELECT hotel_id, date, electricity_consumed, water_consumed FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM hotel;
SELECT hotel_name, location, total_rooms FROM hotel WHERE total_floors > 5;
SELECT hotel_name, SUM(electricity_consumed), SUM(water_consumed) FROM hotel JOIN energy_consumption ON hotel.hotel_id = energy_consumption.hotel_id GROUP BY hotel.hotel_id;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE electricity_consumed > 1000 AND water_consumed > 500 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT hotel_name, location, check_in_time, check_out_time FROM hotel WHERE total_rooms >= 50 ORDER BY hotel_name ASC, location DESC;
SELECT * FROM Hotels;
SELECT hotel_name, location FROM Hotels ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT hotel_name, energy_consumption FROM Hotels WHERE energy_consumption > 1000;
SELECT room_id, room_number, room_type FROM Rooms WHERE occupancy_status = 'Occupied';
SELECT hotel_name, SUM(energy_usage) AS total_energy FROM Hotels JOIN EnergyConsumption ON Hotels.hotel_id = EnergyConsumption.hotel_id GROUP BY hotel_name ORDER BY total_energy DESC;
SELECT * FROM Hotels WHERE energy_consumption > 100 ORDER BY hotel_name DESC;
SELECT hotel_name, COUNT(*) AS total_rooms FROM Rooms GROUP BY hotel_name HAVING total_rooms > 10;
SELECT h.hotel_name, SUM(ec.energy_usage) AS total_energy_usage FROM Hotels h JOIN EnergyConsumption ec ON h.hotel_id = ec.hotel_id GROUP BY h.hotel_name ORDER BY total_energy_usage DESC;

SELECT h.hotel_name, r.room_number, ec.energy_usage, ec.timestamp FROM Hotels h JOIN Rooms r ON h.hotel_id = r.hotel_id JOIN EnergyConsumption ec ON r.room_id = ec.room_id WHERE h.location = 'New York' ORDER BY ec.timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;

SELECT h.hotel_name, r.room_number, ec.energy_usage, ec.timestamp FROM Hotels h JOIN Rooms r ON h.hotel_id = r.hotel_id JOIN EnergyConsumption ec ON r.room_id = ec.room_id WHERE h.energy_consumption < 200 ORDER BY h.energy_consumption ASC, ec.timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM hotel;
SELECT name, location, star_rating FROM hotel WHERE star_rating > 3;
SELECT guest_id, name, nationality, check_in_date FROM guest ORDER BY check_in_date DESC;
SELECT room_id, room_type, price FROM room WHERE price < 1000;
SELECT reading_id, reading_datetime, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY reading_datetime ASC;
SELECT * FROM hotel WHERE star_rating = 4;
SELECT room_id, room_type, price FROM room WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT name, nationality, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM guest WHERE nationality = 'USA' AND check_in_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE reading_datetime >= '2022-07-01' ORDER BY energy_usage DESC;

SELECT h.name AS hotel_name, r.room_type, r.price, g.name AS guest_name FROM hotel h JOIN room r ON h.hotel_id = r.hotel_id JOIN guest g ON r.room_id = g.room_id WHERE h.location = 'New York' AND r.price < 200 ORDER BY g.name ASC;
SELECT * FROM hotels;
SELECT hotel_name, location, rating FROM hotels WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT room_type, capacity, price FROM rooms ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT guest_name, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM reservations WHERE check_in_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT role, salary, hire_date FROM staff WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY hotel_name ASC;
SELECT hotel_name, location, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM hotels GROUP BY location HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT hotel_name, room_type, price FROM hotels INNER JOIN rooms ON hotels.hotel_id = rooms.hotel_id WHERE price < 200 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT guest_name, check_in_date, check_out_date, hotel_name FROM reservations JOIN hotels ON reservations.room_id = rooms.room_id ORDER BY check_in_date ASC;
SELECT role, AVG(salary) AS avg_salary FROM staff GROUP BY role HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY avg_salary DESC;
